title: Four more MPs including Pillaiyan sworn in as State Ministers
body_lines: Four more MPs including Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan alias Pillaiyan have been sworn in as State Ministers before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today.
Accordingly,  Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan was appointed as State Minister of Rural Road Development while  S. Viyalendran as State Minister of Youth and Sports.
Mohammed Musharaf was sworn in as State Minister of Textiles Production Development and Dr. Suren Raghavan as State Minister of Higher Education.
Dr. Raghavan earlier was appointed as State Minister for Education Services and Reforms but later as State Minister of Higher Education. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
